about_the_game: "CannonCraft" is a real-time strategy game that simulates modern missile warfare. On the dark land, players cannot see each other, and whoever fires the first shot may be attacked by other forces. All forces hide themselves, quietly develop their economy, detect the enemy's situation, and build howitzers, Bazookas, Railgun, ICBMs, nuclear bombs, etc offensive weapons. The native creatures on the land will unite to destroy your development, and the enemies will also launch various long-range weapons to destroy you. You can build a defense system like the "Iron Dome" to intercept air threats; you can also steal a march on others, or decisively fight back. The game is designed with dozens of technologies that can be freely combined and dozens of high-precision weapons, which greatly enriched the long-term game experience. "CannonCraft" creatively combines tower defense with RTS, creating a unique experience of missile battle royale.

short_description: Real-time strategy game. Players move freely to find a suitable place to settle down and develop. They build various buildings to explore, attack, and defend themselves, so as to resist AI attacks. They also find and defeat other targets on the map to become the only surviving human player.
